meaning_str.bing:
v. 获得；增加；赢得；取得
n. 增加；利益；好处；利润
网络. 增益；得到；收益

获得；得到（好处）；取得；增加；增长；赢得；（从…中）受益；（从…中）获益；增值；（经过努力）到达；增进；博得；增添
（尤指财富、重量的）增值；收益；改进；获利；进步；获得物；所得；（财富的）增长；进展；（体重、速度等的）增加

1.en: There would be no gain if you were to find yourself at a level that you could not cope with.
1.cn: 你不可能在自己无法应对，超越能力的情况下得到收益。

2.en: It looks like he will at least try. But first, he's got to put on a good show so he can gain everyone's trust and become Chuck's guardian.
2.cn: 他至少会尝试一下的，不过首先他必须好好演场戏好取得众人的信任并成为Chuck的监护人。

3.en: The interviewer is trying to gain some insight into your work personality to see what kind of worker you will be.
3.cn: 雇从念通过那个问题了解你的工做个性，以确定你适合的职位。

0.en: But instead, what I'm proposing is it start accelerating immediately, to preserve velocity and gain even more.
0.cn: 但反之，我想提出的是它现在开始加速，保持速度，甚至获得更多速度。

1.en: I had a plan. I kept leaving Dove Bar wrappers around to explain any weight gain.
1.cn: 我有整套计划，我一直有四处留下巧克力棒包装来解释我为什么发福了。

2.en: So I decided to show you my capture of that brainless oaf Hagrid to gain your trust.
2.cn: 所以我决定把我逮到那个蠢汉海格的经过让你看一看以赢取你的信任。

3.en: He betrayed us, Francis. He told Dunbar about me. To gain her trust, not betray ours.
3.cn: 他背叛了我们，弗兰西斯！他把我的事告诉了邓巴。是为了赢得她的信任，不是为了背叛我们。

4.en: You used me. You wanted the pardons for your own political gain. You're a disgrace to the cause.
4.cn: 你利用我，为了你自己的政治利益，你想得到那特赦，你是我们组织的耻辱。

5.en: Yeah, pretty close. Okay. Ever take anything for depression? Prozac. But it made me gain weight, so I…
5.cn: 对，差不多。好的。服用过抗抑郁药物吗？百忧解。但那让我体重上升,所以...

6.en: Each coral struggles against its neighbors to gain more light at the speed of a few millimetres per year.
6.cn: 每株珊瑚每年生长数毫米，以此与邻居争夺阳光。

7.en: And through understanding each other's popular cultures, we gain insight into each other's hearts and true selves.
7.cn: 通过理解对方的流行文化，我们看到了对方的内心和真实的自我。

8.en: And I did. I lost some of the weight. And if I gain it back, I will lose it again. All right? You are not alone in this.
8.cn: 我的确减了。减掉了些。如果它反弹了，我还会再把它减掉的。好吗？你不是一个人在坚持。

9.en: And last week, Secretary of State Kerry, Secretary of Defense Hagel and military leaders worked to gain their support for our strategy.
9.cn: 上周，国务卿克里，国防部长哈格尔以及众多军队领袖一起争取到了国会对我们的反恐战略的支持。

10.en: A lot of toes were stepped on in order to set this up for today. And frankly, I really don't know what you gentlemen plan to gain by it.
10.cn: 为了设置好今天的这套演示设备，可是折腾了不少人，坦白说，我真不明白你们两位想达到什么目的。

11.en: I think a ball is a perfectly irrational way to gain new acquaintance. It would be better if conversation, instead of dancing, were the order of the day.
11.cn: 我想舞会是认识新人的不理智的方式，聊天比跳舞好，那可是风尚。

12.en: All that proves is that I'm honest, unlike a president who would use the Department of Justice to target his political opponent for his own personal gain.
12.cn: 这只能证明我的诚实，不像总统那样为了个人利益，利用司法部去攻击他的对手。

13.en: Actually, as the newest member of your social group, I believe I'll gain more acceptance by arbitrarily siding with your friends from time to time. Shrewd.
13.cn: 其实作为你们这个社交团体的最新成员，我觉得偶尔偏向你们的朋友们一方更能让我融入你们。真阴险。

14.en: Kalique is in competition with Balem. She knows that the loss of the earth will reduce his yield and impact his position in the market. His loss is her gain.
14.cn: 她和拜蓝有矛盾。他知道失去地球会对拜蓝的产品和市场遭成巨大影响，这叫损人利己。
